content.question: At the beginning of the fourth paragraph (“WHAT . . . people?”), the author uses all capitals primarily to

choices.label: express his wholehearted endorsement of the audience’s viewpoint on a topic
indicate that his own opinions on the topic are likely to be held by many in the audience
urge others to participate in the discussion he has initiated
emphasize the disbelief with which he expects the audience to react to his argument

content.answer: emphasize the disbelief with which he expects the audience to react to his argument

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
